# Text.Replace

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/clawilso15/Text.Replace.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/clawilso15/Text.Replace)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Text.Replace is to analyze survey data with metadat to determine
trends.

## Installation
